name: RocketLife
overview:
Image story telling software, End to End business solutions connecting end customers to manufacturing production facilities delivering unique products world wide.

Branded / cobranded customer facing software in 22 languages connected to best of breed world wide production network in 134 countries.

International currency.

Metrics, reporting, in solution selling, Customer Retention management.

Fastest and best consumer experience reported by an Infotrend conducted survey.

RocketLife is headquartered in Folsom California founded in 2003 by pioneers in Media, Film, Television, 3D, Special Effects and Internet Streaming Technologies. Team members have created and shipped over 100 commercial products providing advanced graphics and video hardware for Apple and Amiga. Including key industry products, Snappy, GlobeCaster and winning 100’s of industry awards including three Prime Time Emmy(R) Awards for Excellence in Engineering Development.

Our technologies have been used to create dozens of major motion pictures such as Star Wars:Phantom Menace, Men In Black, Sleepless in Seattle, Terminator 2, and dozens more.

RocketLife tool features many patent pending technologies such as live 3D Digital Merchandising views, Intelligent Theme Technologies which are aspect and resolution independent. Instant Experience converting in realtime any RocketLife website into another featuring graphic and experience elements. RocketLife Production Network, Brand-O-Matic Distributor/Reseller system, RocketLife Market Place.

All connected via Unified Real-Time Front-Ends same powerful experience in Kiosk, Web, Desktop and Mobile environments.

Advanced project sharing via Facebook, Twitter, Blogs, and embedded links.

Millions installed worldwide, Goto market partner HP, Blacks Photos, Meijer stores and many more.
